alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 21 at 12:29PM AKDT until May 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Along the Richardson Highway from Delta Junction south. * TIMING...Until 10 PM. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...70 to 76. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
